divs: Sighting DetailsI was at the Eifel Tower Restuarant with my new Wife and our wedding party on June 22, 2012 at roughly 7:45pm. The sky was perfectly clear with no clouds, and the sun was beginning to set. I noticed an object in the sky that didnt look right. It appeared to be stationary and showed little movement for over 5 minutes. When I first saw it I assumed it was a rocket in the distance but as time lapsed and it didnt move I began to think it may be something other than military. My party continued to watch until after a short period the object began to rise in the sky slowly at first and then accelerate. We watched it until it disappeared.
trends: There have been 229 other sightings in Las Vegas
There were no other sightings in Las Vegas on or around June 22nd 2012
Summary: object hovered in sky for 5+ minutes then accelerated straight up
